name: Wood & Gold - Plex Web App 2.0 & PlexPy
description:
A rich wood & gold theme for Plex Web App designed with support for use with the Chrome Transmogrify extension if it is used. 

Completely Integrated theme for PlexPy, Plex WebApp and Plex.Tv - Forums
>> Included support for  Transmission 2.92 (14714) Web interface (if installed)
additional_info:
** Edit the top line for your local servers IP addresses. **

@-moz-document url-prefix("https://forums.plex.tv/"), url-prefix("https://app.plex.tv/"), domain("your.plex.server.ip"), domain("your.plexpy.server.ip")


** NOTE::: Chrome makes this much easier to manage 

# v.1.0 Initial release.
# v.2.0 Included support for PlexPy server and a few cosmetic changes to the WebApp.
# v.3.0 Major cosmetic changes to forms and tables for the PlexPy section.
# v.3.1 Added centered Text for Poster Title and Date. From https://userstyles.org/users/320028
# v.3.1a Updated Centered Text # v.3.1 for the New 2.6.0 web app released 4-8-16 
         (only works on library pages due to the new scrolling Discover Feature)
# v.4.0 Integrated Support for Plex.tv, Blog & Forum
# v.4.0a Integrated Support for Plex.tv, Blog & Forum (more visual mods)
# v.4.0b Moved and reconfigured images to Cloudinary hosting
# v.4.0c Included support for Transmission 2.92 (14714) Web interface (if installed)
# v.4.0d Changes for Plex.tv forums and discussions (readability issues)
# v.4.1 Updates for Plex Media Server 0.9.17.3 is now available for Plex Pass members
# v.4.1a Small update to support latest web app release. 


** Currently (Web) Updated Plex Web to  3.5.0 **
